seed_pair.target: He didn't want to look after the young dog all afternoon.
seed_pair.known: No quería cuidar el perro joven toda la tarde.

S0064: aprender español | no es fácil | pero | es divertido
learning Spanish | isn't easy | but | it is fun
S0065: es importante | tomar tiempo | para evaluarte | evaluarte
it's important | to take time | to test yourself | test yourself
S0066: no es difícil | encontrar | la respuesta
it's not difficult | to find | the answer
S0067: por qué | quieres parar | quieres | parar
why | you want to stop | you want | to stop
S0068: what | are you looking for | looking for

practice_phrases: He didn't want to help me
I know he didn't want to stop
He didn't want to speak with me yesterday
She told me he didn't want to learn Spanish
quería decir que no quería aprender español
I think he didn't want to write the letter last night
pienso que no quería escribir una carta anoche
He didn't want to look after
I need to look after that
She wants to look after her friend
I don't want to look after anything today
He told me he didn't want to look after anyone
quería decir que no quería cuidar alguien
I think it's important to look after people when they need you
pienso que es importante cuidar personas cuando necesito
To look after the young dog
I want to look after the young dog
The young dog wants to play
He didn't want to look after the young dog
no quería cuidar el perro joven
I think the young dog is very tired today
pienso que el perro joven estoy muy cansado hoy
She wanted to know who will look after the young dog
quería saber quiere cuidar el perro joven
He told me he didn't want to look after the young dog this afternoon
quería decir que no quería cuidar el perro joven esta tarde
I want to practise all afternoon
I'm going to be here all afternoon
voy a estar aquí toda la tarde
He didn't want to work all afternoon
no quería hacer toda la tarde
I was trying to learn Spanish all afternoon
estaba intentando aprender español toda la tarde
He didn't want to look after the young dog all afternoon
no quería cuidar el perro joven toda la tarde
I think she was looking for something in her bag all afternoon
pienso que estaba buscando algo en su bolsa toda la tarde
She told me he didn't want to look after the young dog all afternoon yesterday
quería decir no quería cuidar el perro joven toda la tarde ayer
